content:
# The insertion of coal into the stone furnace was successful, and I now have 10 units of coal left in my inventory. 
# However, the furnace is still showing a warning for "no ingredients to smelt," which indicates that I need to insert iron ore into the furnace to begin the smelting process.

# I will now insert some iron ore into the stone furnace for smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 units of iron ore into the stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
